data.description: Spacious well maintained Raised Ranch on over an acre of land. Updated kitchen , some newer flooring. Finished Lower Level. Cair in upper level. Large Primary Bedroom with Full Bath. Above Ground Pool. Must See. Seller prefers to sell AS IS. HIGHEST and BEST by Tuesday 1/30/24 5pm
